editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

msContents.summary: F-72v: Acts of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qəddus, Gädlä Gäbrä Mänfäs Qəddus, ገድለ፡ ገብረ፡ መንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡. Paolo Marrassini, Vita Omelia Miracoli del Santo Gabra Manfas Qeddus, CSCO 597/598, EA 107/108 (Louvain: Peeters, 2003). F-56v: The Life of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qəddus, arranged in readings for the months: Miyazya (5v), Genbot (11r), Säne (15v), Ḥamle (21r), Näḥase (26r), Mäskäräm (31v), Ṭəqəmt (35r), Ḫədar (39r), Taḫśaś (43r), Ṭərr (47r), Yäkkatit (51v). F-72v: Twelve Miracles of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qəddus. Illuminations: i v: Our Lady Mary giving water from a shoe to a dog. ii r: The Annunciation. ii v: The Annunciation while Mary is spinning cloth. iii r: Our Lady Mary heals a blind man. iii v: Our Lady Mary and the child Jesus with a broken water jug. : Gäbrä Mänfäs Qəddus flanked by Leopards and Tigers. : Saint George and the Dragon. : Our Lady Mary with Her Beloved Son. : The Crucifixion of Jesus Christ. : The Resurrection of Jesus Christ, raising Adam and Eve from the Dead. Notes. : "May his (Gäbrä Mänfäs Qəddus') prayer and blessing be with his beloved, ገብረ መድኀን, and his servant, ወለተ ተክለ ሃይማኖት, and all the listeners (lit. children of the association of hearing) and its (the book's) reader." The persons mentioned change with each section.
